title: Data Analyst & Data Fraud Referent
description: Transforming raw data into actionable insights for strategic decision-making. Specialized in fraud detection and data analysis to support management decisions through comprehensive dashboards and reporting.
responsibilities: Developed automated data pipelines using Python and SQL for fraud detection
Created interactive dashboards for management reporting and fraud monitoring
Performed statistical analysis and predictive modeling
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify data-driven solutions
Led fraud detection initiatives and implemented risk assessment frameworks

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: Focused on data collection and standardization from ERP systems, building business intelligence solutions to support operational decision-making.
responsibilities: Collected and standardized data from multiple ERP systems
Developed BI dashboards and reporting solutions
Analyzed business processes and identified optimization opportunities
Collaborated with stakeholders to define KPIs and metrics

title: Assistant, Commercial & Supply Chain Consulting
description: Improved business processes through automation and consulting on supply chain analytics and optimization.
responsibilities: Automated business processes and workflows
Provided consulting on supply chain optimization
Analyzed commercial operations and identified improvement areas
Supported decision-making through data analysis

title: Project Management
description: Managed cross-functional projects in automotive supply chain operations.
responsibilities: Coordinated cross-functional projects
Created and improved tools and KPIs
Ensured project delivery within scope and timeline
Facilitated communication between stakeholders

title: Purchasing
description: Supported strategic sourcing and procurement process optimization.
responsibilities: Managed strategic sourcing activities
Optimized procurement processes
Negotiated with suppliers
Analyzed purchasing data and costs
